items.name: Once
meaning: Plays the animation fully, stopping after it completes.

items.name: Loop
meaning: Plays the animation fully, repeating from the start when it completes.

items.name: Bounce
meaning: Plays the animation fully, then plays it again in reverse when it finishes. Repeats from the start.

items.name: Reverse
meaning: Plays the animation in reverse, stopping after it completes.
